name: Biggles On Mars
description:
Grandson of the famous pilot, Biggles makes his living defending the planet of Mars with his rickety plane. Can he overcome a menacing scheme and also finally move into a new line of work?

Short adventure game made in February 2009 for a fangame contest on gamingw.net. Made using Adventure Game Studio. Music credits in readme.

As of 2022 this game works best in compatability mode for Windows XP.

CONTROLS:

Left mouse button: walk, talk, interact

Right mouse button: examine

Esc: main menu (load, save, etc.)

Right-clicking on Biggles brings up the inventory screen.

To examine an inventory item, click on it. To use it with another character, hotspot, or item, first click the arrow button at the bottom of the inventory screen, and then click the item to hold it.
